about.title: Sobre Trilhamos
about.description:
No Trilhamos, acreditamos que cada trilha tem uma história. Não se trata apenas de chegar ao topo, atravessar rios ou acampar sob estrelas — mas de viver cada passo, registrar cada memória e compartilhar com quem ama a aventura.

Criamos um espaço para amantes do trekking, ecoturismo e turismo de aventura se inspirarem, trocarem dicas e descobrirem roteiros incríveis pelo Brasil e pelo mundo. Nossa missão é conectar pessoas e histórias de trilhas, mostrando que cada passo conta.

Aqui você encontra:
- Guias e checklists práticos para suas aventuras
- Planners e journals para registrar cada passo do caminho
- Recomendações de equipamentos confiáveis, testados por quem vive a trilha

Mais do que seguidores ou likes, queremos criar uma comunidade que trilha junto, mesmo que cada um esteja em lugares diferentes. Porque no Trilhamos, cada trilha merece ser contada — e cada história compartilhada inspira outra.

Trilhamos: Compartilhe Histórias de Trilhas!

features.title: Why choose Nuxt.js?
features.description: Nuxt.js is a powerful framework built on top of Vue.js that provides an excellent developer experience.

items.title: Server-Side Rendering
items.description: Nuxt.js allows you to build SSR applications with Vue.js, ensuring fast initial page loads and better SEO.

items.title: Static Site Generation
items.description: You can pre-render pages at build time for static websites. This helps with performance and scalability by serving content directly from a CDN.

items.title: Auto-Routing
items.description: Nuxt automatically generates routes based on the file structure inside the pages directory, reducing the need for manual configuration.

items.title: File-based Configuration
items.description: Nuxt uses a convention-over-configuration approach, allowing you to define configurations easily in nuxt.config.js without much boilerplate.

items.title: Dynamic Imports
items.description: It supports lazy loading of components with dynamic imports to improve performance by splitting the code into smaller chunks.

items.title: SEO Friendly
items.description: With SSR, SSG, and automatic meta tag handling, Nuxt.js ensures your application is SEO-friendly.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Are Saying
testimonials.description: Hear from our clients about their experiences working with Nuxt and Netlify.

items.quote: Nuxt has made building our projects so much easier and more enjoyable! Its simple setup and powerful features help us create fast, responsive websites with minimal effort.

The scalability offered by Netlify and the flexibility of Nuxt have allowed us to expand our site's functionality without worrying about performance issues. This combination is a powerful solution for any growing business.
Switching to Nuxt and Netlify was a game-changer for our development process. The seamless integration between the two platforms allowed us to deploy faster and with fewer headaches.
